title: New Head Coach Wanted! eLysium eSports OOL - Seriously Looking to OCS.
body:
Good Morning,
We need you! 

We need a new Head Coach, after our previous Head Coach Garrett from EUNE unfortunately had to resign as
the time difference was becoming too problematic. He was a Master Tier EUNE player, with experience coaching in the NACS.
This speaks to the sort of quality we are looking for in a Head Coach. Our team consists of Diamond/Masters/Challengers and
we currently have a manager and analyst. 

The team has a very strong and well organised internal infrastructure, everything is done in a professional manner. For more details apply to the email address provided below, if you have the requisite experience and quality we are looking for, an interview will be arranged.

Please send your applications to elysiumesportsoce@gmail.com. 

We are currently 7th out of 68 in the OOL -> Current Table: http://imgur.com/57FQKWn


https://twitter.com/eLysiumOCE
